Texts.Chs: 每个额外的船员都需要一张新床。部分床可当作多张床，如双层床。
Texts.Eng: For each additional crewmate you'll need a new bed. Some beds can house more than one, such as Bunk Beds.
If you want to ^orange;Hire Crewmates^reset; then you first need to build a ^green;Crappy Crew Bed^reset;. Build one at a ^orange;Ship Component Assembler^reset; and place it on your ship!
